item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Mangere, Auckland Region, National, Fire and Emergency
item.title: 'Close your windows': Warning to people near giant Auckland blaze
item.description:
Fire crews are battling a massive blaze in Māngere at a Tourism Holding campervan workshop near Auckland Airport.
Eleven fire crews from across Auckland are battling the giant blaze at Richard ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202036/eight_col_Mangerefire1_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Nineteen crews battled the blaze. Photo / RNZ

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202036/firemangeresep3_70x70.png?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Up to 19 fire crews from around Auckland are responding to a huge blaze in Māngere, South Auckland, early this morning. Photo / Kat Korunić

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202036/ImagefromiOS35_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The blaze, on Auckland's Richard Pearse drive, is at a vehicle storage yard. Photo / Lynley Ward

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202036/ImagefromiOS34_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Thick smoke is billowing near Auckland Airport after 19 fire crews battle a blaze at a car yard. Photo / Lynley Ward
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202036/Capture_70x71.png?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The blaze is at 36 Richard Pearse Drive in Māngere. Photo / Google Maps
